name: Echoes (itch) (DavidTorres)
description:
Welcome to Echoes! This is an experimental game where there are next to no visuals, and players must rely entirely on sound!

There are a few visuals in the game: the title screen, the main loading screen, and when the player is in-game, the only thing they see is the game’s control scheme. Other than that, everything is sound.

The player takes the role of a young man, trying to find out the mystery of where his older brother went, and what happened to him. This is an investigation game, with the twist of: you can't see anything, and must use your ears to navigate the world!

[XBOX 360 / XBOX ONE CONTROLLER REQUIRED]

[STEREO HEADPHONES REQUIRED]
